SENT.plain: We present a case report of a patient with a suspicious ileal carcinoid tumour
Clinical examination as well as computer tomography (CT) scan suggested a tumour
Octeotride scan showed uptake in the same bowel loop reported as pathological in CT
The patient underwent surgery and biopsy which reported Crohn's disease (CD)
The interest in the case is due to the fact that this is, to the best of our knowledge, the second report of Crohn's disease as a cause of false positive octeotride scan
Unfortunately, no somatostatin receptors could be found in the sample, so further studies should be performed
